post.summary: Stripe webhook (called by Stripe servers only)
post.description:
⚠️ Do NOT call from client. Stripe sends payment events here.

Events handled:
- checkout.session.completed
- payment_intent.succeeded
- payment_intent.payment_failed

Requires raw body for signature verification.

parameters.name: stripe-signature
parameters.description: Stripe webhook signature for HMAC-SHA256 verification

requestBody.description: Raw Stripe event payload (must NOT be JSON-parsed)
